SEO_TAGS.TITLE: Boxed Awning - Elegance and Durability for Any Space
SEO_TAGS.DESCRIPTION: Discover the elegance and durability of the Boxed Awning. Perfect for any space, offering modern style, extreme durability, and advanced customization options.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Boxed Awning
HERO_SECTION.HEADLINE: Elegance and durability for any space

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Extreme Durability
HIGHLIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: The box protects the fabric and awning components when closed

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Advanced Customization
HIGHLIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Option to add wind sensor and LED lighting

DESCRIPTION_SECTION.TITLE: Description
PARRAGRAPHS: The key feature of the boxed awning is its full box system, which encloses and protects both the fabric and the extendable arms and other functional components. This innovative design ensures that all elements of the awning are shielded from the weather when not in use, significantly extending the product's lifespan.
Additionally, the box minimizes the required maintenance and keeps the awning in perfect condition for longer, offering excellent value for money over time.

For an even more modern and functional experience, you can opt to add integrated LED lighting, creating a cozy atmosphere at night. Furthermore, the addition of wind sensors provides extra protection, as the awning will automatically retract in strong winds, preventing damage and ensuring its durability.
